DOC.brief_summary: A study determine three different dose new acne treatment safe well reduce facial acne treatment without active ingredient .
DOC.brief_title: A Study New Drug Treatment Acne
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 400 male female subject moderate facial acne vulgaris enrol randomize , multi-center study . Following satisfaction entry criterion screen procedure , subject randomize either 1.2 % , 2.4 % , 3.6 % facial cream ( JNJ 10229570-AAA ) color-matched vehicle . Subjects apply study medication daily face 12 week . Safety monitor throughout study duration . Efficacy assess facial lesion count investigator global evaluation acne severity Baseline Weeks 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 . Approximately 50 subject one investigational site also serums collect Weeks 6 12 evaluation multiple dose pharmacokinetics JNJ 10229570-AAA cream .

Females hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy bilateral tubal ligation require use additional birth control method Known sensitivity ingredient study medication More 3 nodulocystic acne lesion Use acne treatment , therapy medication within protocolspecified timeframes Presence skin condition , disease , medical condition ( per protocol opinion investigator ) may require concurrent therapy , interfere evaluation study medication , compromise subject safety Excessive facial hair may interfere application medication and/or evaluation
